conditions: Breast Cancer, Lung Cancer, Skin Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Develop real-time 4D video imaging guidance with combination use of cone-beam computerized tomography (CBCT) useful for daily setup and target motion tracking in advanced image-guided radiotherapy (IGRT).
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All patients benefit from advanced IGRT can participate to the study except for those emergent and pediatric patients (age \<18 years) who require special care or there is no time for the setup the 4D video systems
* The patient population would be selected according to the technical progress and clinical needs

Exclusion Criteria:

* None
